billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

title: Authorizes additional tax credits for certain costs incurred in film and television productions in N.Y. city
actClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and part P of chapter 60 of the laws of 2004, amending the tax law relating to the empire state film production credit, in relation to authorizing additional tax credits for certain costs incurred in film and television productions in a city having a population of one million or more
